element.name: ACN Incident Vehicle Manufacturer
element.definition: The Automated Collision Notification Vehicle Manufacturer (e.g., General Motors, Ford, BMW, etc.).
element.v3Comment: Based on Vehicular Emergency Data Set: Manufacturer. Vehicular Emergency Data Set (VEDS) Recommendations. Version 3.0 Prepared: (February 2011) by the Advanced Automatic Crash Notification (AACN)Joint APCO/NENA Data Standardization Working Group.
element.v3Changes: Added to better incorporate advanced automated collision notification information.
